## Documentation Request

### What documentation is missing or unclear?

Describe which part of the documentation needs improvement or is missing.

### Location

Where is this documentation located (or should be located)?

- [ ] README.md
- [ ] CONTRIBUTING.md
- [ ] API/CLI documentation
- [ ] Inline code comments
- [ ] Tutorial or example
- [ ] Other (please specify)

### Describe what documentation is needed

A clear and concise description of what documentation should be added or
improved.

### Example

If applicable, provide an example or link to similar documentation that you find
helpful.

### Additional Context

Add any other context or details about the documentation request here.
